title: Spinneys becomes first UAE retailer to transition to recycled plastic packaging, in partnership with Al Bayader International - ZAWYA
summary: Spinneys, a leading UAE supermarket retailer, has partnered with Al Bayader International to introduce recycled plastic packaging (rPET) for its private label products. This move aligns with Spinneys' sustainability commitments and aims to reduce its environmental impact by using less energy and water while also diverting waste from landfills. The new packaging, containing 30% rPET, is expected to reduce CO2 emissions by 20% and will be used for SpinneysFOOD's croissant and muffin ranges.

greenwashing: The article does not provide any evidence to suggest that the rPET packaging initiative is an example of greenwashing.
